name: Ivejas
tagline: IT solutions for individuals & growing businesses!
description:
About us:
We are a Vilnius-based digital agency that creates web applications and mobile applications for clients worldwide. Our team of talented developers work with various programming languages and frameworks. In addition, we are an official partner of MeteorJS.
We work with:
Node.js 
CakePHP 
PHP
Meteor
Laravel
React
React native
Experience:
Most of our web development experience comes from creating web applications and web tools. With Node.js we created several closed-code mobile applications for world-known companies associated with e-commerce. We also worked on job-search tools and price comparison platforms. 
Our Clients: 
In Ivejas we strive to work with foreign companies and individuals as we currently provide 90% of our services to countries such as Germany, UK, The Netherlands, USA and more. Also, around 75% of our partners we work with are medium-sized companies.
You can find more about us at:
https://www.ivejas.com/
https://www.linkedin.com/company/ivejas/
https://twitter.com/Ivejas1
